value.title: Microsoft Ignite Data and Analytics roundup: Platform extensions are the key theme
value.excerpt: Microsoft is introducing a new Apache Cassandra Azure service, while adding new onramps to Azure Synapse Analytics. And it’s the first third-party cloud to cleanroom engineer its own MongoDB 4.0 API.

value.title: Microsoft launches Azure Arc machine learning and container services
value.excerpt: Microsoft unveiled two new Azure Arc services aimed at data scientists and enterprises with containerized workloads.

value.title: RBAC support is now generally available on Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: At Microsoft's Ignite 2021 conference, the company has announced a host of new capabilities now available across its Azure Cognitive Search and Azure Machine Learning solutions. Additionally, it has also announced a bunch of features currently in preview ...

value.title: From the Data and AI Expert Labs: Break open your processes
value.excerpt: Today, I want to reinforce that you shouldn’t rely on a compelling incident. You don’t need to wait until a system breaks to make it better. A great example is the Interactive Voice Response systems (IVR) that are pretty standard in customer service. We’ve all interacted with them. They’re slow, they’re

value.title: Sonantic uses AI to infuse emotion in automated speech for game prototypes
value.excerpt: Sonantic has figured out how to use AI to turn written words into spoken words in a script, and it can infuse those words with the proper emotion. And it turns out this is a pretty good way to prototype the audio storytelling in triple-A video games.

value.title: Who leads the world on AI? A decade from now, it might not be the US
value.excerpt: National Security Commission on Artificial Intelligence fears US dominance in AI could be lost to China within 10 years due to a serious boost in investments and computing capabilities.

value.title: AWS rekindles a crafty scheme to get developers into machine learning
value.excerpt: Amazon wants to encourage more newcomers to the world of machine learning, and has given a new spin to an old idea to try and make it happen. Three years ago, the company created AWS DeepRacer, a racing competition where enthusiasts from all over the world would develop a 1/18 scale race car and power it with a machine learning model.

value.title: AI chip firm Wave Computing emerges from Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence chip designer Wave Computing Inc said on Monday it has emerged from Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection following an auction of the company and will rebrand the firm as MIPS.

value.title: Compute and storage updates are available for mission-critical applications on Azure
value.excerpt: Microsoft has announced a host of capabilities for mission-critical workloads on Azure include optimizations to compute, storage, backup, management, development, and networking.

value.title: Panel on artificial intelligence urges US to boost tech skills amid China’s rise
value.excerpt: Former Google CEO Eric Schmidt and current executives from Google, Microsoft, Oracle and Amazon are among the 15 members of the National Security Commission on Artificial Intelligence, which released its final report to Congress on Monday.

value.title: Azure Percept: Edge intelligence from silicon to service
value.excerpt: In today’s fast-paced world, there is often a need for instantaneous, real-time responses. Companies are finding the computing needed to support this 24/7 mentality generates staggering amounts of data, often from devices out in the physical world.

value.title: Quality Match raises $6 million to build better AI datasets
value.excerpt: Join Transform 2021 for the most important themes in enterprise AI & Data. Learn more. Quality Match, a Heidelberg, Germany-based quality data annotation provider, today announced that it raised a €5 million ($6 million) seed round from LEA Partners.

value.title: National Security Commission on Artificial Intelligence issues report on how to maintain U.S. dominance
value.excerpt: The National Security Commission on AI report makes recommendations ranging from 5G and China to immigration policy and civil rights.

value.title: How China’s synthetic media startup Surreal nabs funding in 3 months
value.excerpt: What if we no longer needed cameras to make videos and can instead generate them through a few lines of coding? Advances in machine learning are turning the idea into a reality. We’ve seen how deepfakes swap faces in family photos and turn one’s selfies into famous video clips.

value.title: Markforged, a 3D Printing Startup, Will Go Public in a SPAC Merger
value.excerpt: Per details of the deal, which is expected to be finalized sometime this summer, the combined valuation of the merged companies is expected to be $2.1 billion

value.title: AWS reorganizes DeepRacer League to encourage more newbies
value.excerpt: AWS launched the DeepRacer League in 2018 as a fun way to teach developers machine learning, and it’s been building on the idea ever since. Today, it announced the latest league season with two divisions: Open and Pro.

value.title: This AI-generated Daft Punk video is the perfect tribute to the electro pioneers
value.excerpt: Computer artist Glenn Marshall paid homage to Daft Punk by using AI to produce a music video for the duo's 2001 track "Voyager."

value.title: Skydio hits billion-dollar valuation for autonomous drone tech

value.title: Underwater robot rises from the depths to save drowning swimmers
value.excerpt: Even though lifeguards are essential to maintaining safety at swimming pools, they can't always see everything that's happening, nor can all pool operators afford to pay their salaries. That's where a new swimmer-saving underwater robot is designed to come in.

value.title: Amazon (AMZN) Boosts AWS Portfolio With Lookout for Vision
